Player History
Drove in 7 runs against Kansas City on 9/3/1965...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Kansas City on 4/4/1967...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1967, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/20/1967...
Injured on 9/5/1968 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Cleveland to New York (N) on 2/13/1970 (Going to CLE: 3B J. Terrell. Going to NYM: CF J. Hickman)...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/24/1971 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
